answers.question: Is your project a member or past grantee of one of these networks?

answers.answer:
- üè´ **Higher Fidelity Org Pages** ‚Äì We aim to dramatically improve the Orgs panel to provide a comprehensive aggregation service for Orgs in the Regenerative Finance ecosystem.

- üìå **Taxonomy Update** ‚Äì We are already working on a new asset classification that we aim to finish soon. This updated classification streamlines the current taxonomy to be more intuitive and aligned with the evolving industry of impact reporting.

- üìä **Market Cap Dashboard** ‚Äì Work has been started to provide users with real-time insights into market statistics based on the updated taxonomy, and shall continue thanks to your support.  With this, we‚Äôll be able to track the growth of the ReFi sector.

- ‚ûï **More Assets & Providers** ‚Äì Continuously adding verified projects to the database.

- üì∫ **UX/UI Improvements** ‚Äì With the rapid growth of the ReFi sector, we've pinned many green assets and orgs to the Regen Atlas. Now, we need to clean up the pins, and differentiate them in a way that is easily understandable for the user.
answers.question: What are your key active goals, plans, objectives or milestones for this year?

project.title: Regen Atlas üåç
project.description:
Let‚Äôs make **ReFi organizations as visible and impactful as the green assets they support.** üöÄ 

#### **Project Overview**  

Regen Atlas is a **green crypto-asset aggregator**, unifying all major **ReFi assets and issuers** in one interface. Our goal is to simplify access to climate-positive Web3 assets, making it easier for users to discover, compare, and trade **high-impact ReFi assets**.  

Now, we are **expanding beyond assets and issuers**‚Äîour next major feature is an **Orgs Filter**, which will allow users to explore **ReFi organizations (ReFi Local Nodes, the GreenPill Chapters, Celo Regional DAOs, etc)** that are actively driving regenerative finance adoption worldwide.  

[View prototype version of the Org Filter](https://www.regenatlas.xyz/orgs)

[View project on KarmaGAP](https://gap.karmahq.xyz/project/regen-atlas-)

## üßë‚Äçüíª Roadmap & Future Plans

With your support, Regen Atlas will achieve the following milestones:

- üè´ **Higher Fidelity Org Pages** ‚Äì We aim to dramatically improve the Orgs panel to provide a comprehensive aggregation service for Orgs in the Regenerative Finance ecosystem.
- üìå **Taxonomy Update** ‚Äì We are already working on a new asset classification that we aim to finish soon. This updated classification streamlines the current taxonomy to be more intuitive and aligned with the evolving industry of impact reporting.
- üìä **Market Cap Dashboard** ‚Äì Work has been started to provide users with real-time insights into market statistics based on the updated taxonomy, and shall continue thanks to your support.  With this, we‚Äôll be able to track the growth of the ReFi sector.
- ‚ûï **More Assets & Providers** ‚Äì Continuously adding verified projects to the database.

But most importantly, we have started the development of an [Orgs Filter](https://www.regenatlas.xyz/orgs) that aims to:  

1. **Bridging the gap between asset buyers and local ReFi communities**  
   - Today, Regen Atlas users can **purchase green assets**, but they have no direct way to **engage with the organizations building the ReFi movement** in their regions.  
   - The **Orgs Filter** will change this‚Äîusers connecting to Regen Atlas will be able to **discover local ReFi communities**.

2. **Increasing visibility and funding for ReFi builders**  
   - Many ReFi organizations operate at the grassroots level and struggle to gain visibility.  
   - Our new filter will ensure **ReFi DAO Chapters, the GreenPill Network, Celo Regional DAOs, etc.** are as discoverable as the green assets they help enable.  
   - This will **drive participation and funding to organizations that are educating, onboarding, and scaling ReFi adoption globally**.   

## üìö Resources

üîó **[GitHub](https://github.com/Regen-Atlas)**  
üåê **[Website](https://www.regenatlas.xyz/)**
üìÑ **[Docs](https://regen-atlas.gitbook.io/regen-atlas-docs)**  
‚úíÔ∏è **[Blog](https://paragraph.xyz/@regenatlas)**  
üê¶ **[X](https://x.com/theregenatlas)**  

We deeply appreciate your generosity and support! üôè
